actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians in Indian Claims Commission Dockets 153 and 135.

summary.text: Authorizes the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians in specified Indian Claims Commission dockets. Sets forth distribution requirements for such funds.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians in Indian Claims Commission Dockets 153 and 135.
